Test http://www.w3.org/2001/DOM-Test-Suite/level3/core/nodegetuserdata06

<test name='nodegetuserdata06' schemaLocation='http://www.w3.org/2001/DOM-Test-Suite/Level-3 dom3.xsd'>
     <metadata>
          <title>nodegetuserdata06</title>
          <creator>IBM</creator>
          <description> Invoke getUserData on a new Text node with an ampty Key check if the returned UserData object is Null. </description>
          <contributor>Neil Delima</contributor>
          <date qualifier='created'>2002-06-10</date>
          <subject resource='http://www.w3.org/TR/2004/REC-DOM-Level-3-Core-20040407/core#Node3-getUserData'/>
</metadata>
     <var name='doc' type='Document'/>
     <var name='txt' type='Text'/>
     <var name='retUserData' type='DOMUserData'/>
     <load var='doc' href='hc_staff' willBeModified='false'/>
     <createTextNode var='txt' obj='doc' data='"TEXT"'/>
     <getUserData var='retUserData' obj='txt' key='""'/>
     <assertNull actual='retUserData' id='nodegetuserdata06'/>
</test>
